product_name: Timbuk2 Bike Seat Pack XT - Small - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Keep small items secure on every ride with the small Timbuk2 Bike Seat Pack XT. Upgraded "XT" version includes reflective patches on back and a spot to hang your rear light. Built from rugged ballistic nylon construction with waterproof nylon accents. Small-size saddle pack holds small essentials such as ID, keys and small tools; wide zippered opening provides easy access. Secures to bike seat with adjustable side-release buckle; front bungee secures pack to seat tube. Timbuk2 Bike Seat Pack XT features a reflective rear panel that doubles as an attachment point for bike lights. Closeout.
short_description: Keep small items secure on every ride with the small Timbuk2 Bike Seat Pack XT. Upgraded "XT" version includes reflective patches on back and a spot to hang your rear light.
